summary:
About Steve's Coin - STEVE knew this coin would come. You like the art, we make the coin.

 Tokenomics of $HERO - "$HERO 💎 🤚. I don’t need money. I give away all my money.. legacy over money . I want respect in the crypto community . Respect is everything. Your word is everything . Your word is the strongest most valuable currency" - Steve

 Roadmap of $STEVE - All jokes aside, here is a rough sketch of $STEVE path ahead. We dont wan’t to give everything away on day 1, Expect surprises along the way ;)
